content: "Paint a watercolor landscape of a beautiful, serene view of a rolling valley, surrounded by towering mountains and a clear, blue sky. In the foreground, a small, winding stream should be visible, with tall grasses and wildflowers growing along its banks. In the background, the majestic peaks of the mountains should be visible, with clouds and sunlight adding to the mood of the scene. Use a loose, expressive style and a vibrant, colorful palette to capture the beauty of the scene."
